textPlain: ThisÂ is not corruption, this is tribute to the Great Kahn.Tim Cook has been forced to move operations from China to India and now to the US, each decision economically unjustifiable and now to great loss to Apple's bottom line. People may not realise it, but this is the state reasserting control over the capitalists. Trump is the first US President to actually try and do this. Not dissimilar to Xi Jinping in 2020 incidentally.
